mapper.select: SELECT hi.apt_seq AS aptSeq, hi.apt_nm AS aptName, hd.floor AS floor, hd.exclu_use_ar AS excluUseAr, hi.umd_nm AS legalDong, hd.deal_amount AS tradeAmount, hi.latitude AS latitude, hi.longitude AS longitude, hd.deal_year AS dealYear, hd.deal_month AS dealMonth, hd.deal_day AS dealDay FROM housedeals hd JOIN houseinfos hi ON hd.apt_seq = hi.apt_seq WHERE hi.apt_seq = #{aptSeq} ORDER BY hd.deal_year DESC, hd.deal_month DESC, hd.deal_day DESC

SELECT hi.apt_seq AS aptSeq, hi.sgg_cd AS sggCd, hi.umd_cd AS umdCd, hi.umd_nm AS umdNm, hi.jibun AS jibun, hi.road_nm_sgg_cd AS roadNmSggCd, hi.road_nm AS roadNm, hi.road_nm_bonbun AS roadNmBonbun, hi.road_nm_bubun AS roadNmBubun, hi.apt_nm AS aptNm, hi.build_year AS buildYear, hi.latitude AS latitude, hi.longitude AS longitude FROM houseinfos hi WHERE hi.apt_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{aptName}, '%') ORDER BY hi.apt_nm;

SELECT apt_seq AS aptSeq, sgg_cd AS sggCd, umd_cd AS umdCd, umd_nm AS umdNm, jibun, road_nm_sgg_cd AS roadNmSggCd, road_nm AS roadNm, road_nm_bonbun AS roadNmBonbun, road_nm_bubun AS roadNmBubun, apt_nm AS aptNm, build_year AS buildYear, latitude, longitude FROM houseinfos WHERE apt_seq = #{aptSeq}
SELECT DISTINCT hi.sgg_cd AS sggCd, hi.umd_cd AS umdCd, hi.umd_nm AS umdNm FROM houseinfos hi WHERE hi.umd_nm = #{dongName} LIMIT 1
